name: Lost World (T-more)
description:
It's a 3D Platformer.  The game occurs after an event known as the great cataclysm, that left the world broken. You are required to collect ancient artifacts in hopes of recovering knowledge about the lost world.

Currently the storyline hasn't been developed yet. And Contains only two levels.

The only things that you can do are:

-Explore the world

-Collect some artifacts indicated by the objectives panel until it reaches 100%

-Interact with some unusual beings
